schema:creator: Choquette, Sam
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ Highlighter pens and ink on sketch paper. i drew this because when i read the idea list and saw 'gardening' i thought about how many of us are taking this time inside and away from others to work on ourselves. though it's easy to feel blue and unmotivated during these difficult times i hope my piece will serve as a reminder to try and avoid falling into stagnancy and as encouragement to look for beauty inside when we are unable to go out.  
 __Participant age:__ 19  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Drawing or Painting
schema:name: Personal Growth
